job_title: Questionnaire Specialist
company: 香港商信天翁諮詢有限公司台灣分公司
tags: 距捷運市政府站約220公尺, 年終獎金
job_description:
Description
We are growing! We are currently looking to hire a Questionnaire Specialist to work with us remotely!

Who we are:

Founded in 2006, our story started with two entrepreneurs. Today, we’re proud to be a global business. From Shanghai to Paris, we have 12 offices and operate across four continents in 70 countries. We are home to over 160 professionals from around the world, working together to serve more than 200 luxury clients.

At CXG, we love to evolve, elevate, and transform experiences while bringing brand promises to life. We offer strategic solutions that impact performance and elevate the customer experience of some of the world’s most iconic premium and luxury brands.

What you will be doing:

In this role, you will be responsible for the successful implementation of questionnaires under the supervision of the VP – Data Science.

Collaborative work environment: Join a dynamic team and work closely with project managers to prepare and set up questionnaires on our systems. Your input will be valuable in ensuring a smooth and efficient project launch.
Problem-solving opportunities: Use your skills in debugging logical conflicts and system errors to overcome challenges and ensure the flawless functioning of our projects. Your expertise will be crucial in maintaining high-quality standards.
Quality control and enhancement: As the gatekeeper of questionnaire quality, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the overall analytical output. Your attention to detail and dedication to quality assurance will contribute to the success of our projects.
Global engagement: Manage daily requests from various departments around the world, providing support and assistance. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate with diverse teams and expand your cultural understanding.
Requirements
What you will bring along:

Detail-oriented and fast learner: We value individuals who pay close attention to detail, have a quick grasp of new concepts, and can effectively manage their time in a fast-paced work environment. A can-do attitude is essential to thriving in this role.
Strong logical mind and problem-solving skills: We are looking for candidates with a sharp and analytical mindset. Your ability to approach challenges logically and find effective solutions will be highly valued.
Strong communication skills: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, are essential for this position. The ability to convey information clearly and effectively is crucial in collaborating with team members and stakeholders.
Exceptional written and oral communication abilities in English: Fluency in English, both written and spoken, is vital. Your proficiency in English will enable effective communication with international colleagues and stakeholders.
Experience with ERP or quality control (a plus): Previous experience with Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems or quality control processes would be advantageous. Familiarity with these areas will enhance your ability to contribute effectively to our operations.
Passion for the Luxury and Fashion industry: A genuine enthusiasm for the Luxury and Fashion industry is highly desirable. Your passion for this field will bring added motivation and dedication to your work.
Fluency in Chinese is a big plus!
If you have what we are looking for, please make sure to attach your updated Resume with your contact details.

Should your profile fit the requirements for the role, we will get in touch with you to get a deeper understanding of your profile, to discuss the role in more detail and potential next steps.
job_categories: 數據分析師／資料分析師,市場調查／市場分析,資料工程師
other_conditions: 無

job_title: 資料庫工程師
company: 尚承科技股份有限公司
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 彈性上下班
job_description:
【職務概要】
資料庫工程師負責資料庫系統的設計、開發、管理及維護，確保資料庫的正常運作與安全管理。

【主要職責】
1. 資料庫設計與開發：
設計資料的結構，規劃各種通訊資料的整合，以利資料庫正常運作。 
支援應用程式設計工作，確保資料庫與應用系統的有效整合。

2. 資料庫管理與維護：
維持資料庫的正常運作，加強資料庫的安全管理，以防止駭客或有心人士入侵資料庫。 
定期備份資料庫中的資料，以備不時之需。

3. 資料安全與權限管理：
研訂資料及人員的保密區分，制定資訊安全管理策略，確保資料的安全性與隱私性。 

4. 效能優化與問題排除：
監控資料庫效能，進行調優，確保系統高效運行。
快速診斷並解決資料庫相關問題，提供技術支援。

5. 文件與程序制定：
訂定資料使用的程序及資料使用人資格條件，確保資料的正確使用與管理。

【任職資格】
1. 學歷要求：
資訊工程、電腦科學或相關領域學士以上學位。

2. 經驗要求：
至少3年以上資料庫管理或開發經驗。
熟悉主流資料庫系統（如 MySQL、PostgreSQL、Oracle、MS SQL Server 等）。

3. 技能要求：
精通 SQL 語言，具備資料庫程式開發及撰寫能力。
熟悉資料庫管理及維護，具備資料備份與還原能力。
了解資料庫安全性設定與權限管理，能夠制定並實施安全策略。
具備資料庫效能調優經驗，能夠進行效能監控與優化。

4. 能力要求：
良好的問題分析與解決能力，能夠在壓力下有效工作。
優秀的溝通與協作能力，能夠與開發團隊及其他相關人員有效合作。
強烈的責任心和主動性，關注細節，追求卓越。

job_title: 軟體類--資料工程部門主管 (竹北)
company: 華邦電子股份有限公司
tags: 上市上櫃, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 優於勞基法特休, 彈性上下班
job_description:
【在華邦，學習不設限，讓AI技術力與你的未來力同步成長!】
我們深信「人才永續」是企業創新的核心動能。華邦持續投資於數據素養與AI應用的培育，支持每一位人才掌握AI與數據應用的核心能力。

．內部學習平台提供超過4,000堂線上課程，其中包含近850堂資料科學、人工智慧、數據思維與程式技術等多元主題，支援彈性自主學習
．建立跨部門的 AI實作班與技術社群，定期舉辦研習與交流活動，讓知識轉化為實戰力
．完善數據應用學習資源，結合資料呈現(Power BI、Tableau)、資料處理(Python、JMP)、流程自動化(Power Automate、UiPath)、AI助手(Copilot)，協助同仁有效以數據驅動決策與創新。
．搭配專業語言學習平台，提供學習補助與資源，鼓勵同仁持續進修，拓展國際視野

無論你是技術新秀還是資深專才，華邦鼓勵所有領域都能與AI結合，與國際接軌。持續精進、突破自我！

【邀請您將104履歷同步上傳至華邦官方網站，將使您的履歷優先被主管看見】
此職缺履歷登錄網址: https://bit.ly/46SiQSY

我們正在尋找一位兼具戰略視野與技術深度的資料工程部門主管，領導團隊打造一個高擴展性、高可用的現代化資料平台  ，領導公司資料平台與資料管線架構的設計、建置與優化，涵蓋ETL/ELT流程、資料湖與資料倉儲架構，實現雲地混合部署。您將結合管理能力與技術領導力，協助集團實現資料賦能，提升數據價值以增強核心競爭力。
 
[工作內容]
1. 制定資料技術的未來藍圖與發展路徑 ，主導和推動新技術導入或流程再造，持續提升資料平台效能。
2. 帶領並發展一支高效能的資料團隊，包含招募、指導、績效管理與人才發展，打造正向且鼓勵創新的團隊文化。
3. 推動數據驅動決策與創新，並落實應用在商業分析、產品決策、AI、自動化等領域。
4. 在組織內推廣數據驅動決策的文化，透過指標化管理提升團隊與平台的運營效率。
5. 定義資料管線 (Data Pipeline) 的最佳實踐，讓數據接入、處理 (ETL/ELT) 到服務的流程順暢、高效且可靠，支援跨部門資料需求。
6. 推動資料治理與資料品質提升計畫，確保數據的品質、安全性與合規性  。

job_title: Sr Data Analyst
company: 香港商雅是達電子有限公司台灣分公司
industry: 其他電子零組件相關業
tags: 外商公司, 距捷運西湖站約270公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助
job_description:
<About Advanced Energy> 

Advanced Energy (Nasdaq: AEIS) is a global leader in the design and manufacturing of highly engineered, precision power conversion, measurement, and control solutions for mission-critical applications and processes. AE’s power solutions enable customer innovation in complex applications for various industries, including semiconductor equipment, industrial, manufacturing, telecommunications, data center computing, and healthcare. With engineering expertise and responsive service and support worldwide, the company builds collaborative partnerships to meet technological advancements, drive growth for its customers, and innovate the future of power. Advanced Energy has dedicated four decades to perfecting power for its global customers and is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.

<About the Senior Data Analyst Role>

As a Senior Data Analyst, you will be an integral part of AE’s global supply chain function. Within the Global Supply Chain function, you will support the data and analytics needs as the function progresses towards its digital transformation. As a highly motivated analyst, you will champion data-driven decision-making. You will assist internal teams in transitioning from traditional working methods and extracting valuable insights. Additionally, you will contribute to the digital transformation journey by digitizing and automating data extraction and preparation processes. This role offers an excellent opportunity to gain a comprehensive understanding of the supply chain function from industry professionals and to grow within the Analytics space.

Key Responsibilities:
• Engage with stakeholders, including operational managers and senior executives, to understand critical business questions addressed through analytics.
• Support discovery sessions and requirements workshops for business users.
• Identify data sources, collect data through manual or automated means, source missing data, and clean, transform, and organize data into a usable format.
• Design, develop, and deploy reports and dashboards (data visualization), and generate business presentations and formal written reports to communicate the results of data analysis.
• Document data flow and process flow, identifying gaps and areas for improvement.
• Train and support the Internal Data Champion through coaching and mentoring.
• Collaborate with IT and internal teams to support cloud initiatives and data asset migration.

Qualifications:
• Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent STEM fields.
• Minimum of 5 years of experience in analytics domain.
• Proven experience working with senior business stakeholders (essential).
• Strong understanding and experience with cloud platforms, preferably Databricks or Azure
• Hands-on experience with SQL with the ability to write production-level code (essential).
• Proficiency with Power BI & DAX for analytics and data visualization (essential).
• Advanced knowledge of data wrangling and data transformation techniques for cleaning and translating raw data into usable forms using Python (Good to have).
• Familiarity with data governance, master data, and metadata management.
• Knowledge of Power Apps, Power Automate, and UI Path is a significant plus but not mandatory.
• Experience in Manufacturing or Supply Chain is highly desirable.
• Knowledge of SAP S4 and understanding of relevant data tables is a significant plus.

Learning & Development Opportunities:
• Opportunity to learn and grow in the Supply Chain Digital Transformation space as AE embarks on its journey.
• Coaching and mentoring from Analytics Leaders in the field.
• Opportunities to travel and collaborate with cross-border teams on internal initiatives.

Note: This position can be filled in the Philippines, Taiwan, and Thailand.
job_categories: 數據分析師／資料分析師,資料工程師
other_conditions: Welcome people with disabilities to apply (歡迎身心障礙者投遞)

job_title: AI Waifu LLM Prompt & Testing Engineer
company: 萬達人工智慧科技股份有限公司
tags: 距捷運中山國中站約290公尺
job_description:
AI Waifu LLM Prompt & Testing Engineer

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Prompt & Testing Engineer to join our team. This role focuses on designing, optimizing, and testing prompt strategies for large language models (LLMs) that power anime-inspired AI companions—AI waifus—in our product darlin™ (www.darlin.ai).

Responsibilities
1. Prompt Design & Optimization for AI Waifus: Create and refine prompt strategies—such as Chain of Thought Prompting, Reasoning Prompts etc.. enhance AI waifu personality, dialogue authenticity, and behavioral accuracy.
2. AI Waifu Benchmark Development & Analysis: Design and run benchmarks that evaluate AI waifu performance, including multilingual conversation quality, emotional expression, and personality consistency, using both quantitative and qualitative methods.
3. Testing Iteration & Optimization for Waifu Interactions: Lead test planning, dataset creation, and iterative refinement cycles focused on improving AI waifu conversational stability, responsiveness, and contextual understanding.
4. Dataset Creation for Waifu Scenarios: Work with data scientists to generate, annotate, and clean datasets featuring anime-style dialogue, emotional tone, and scenario-based interactions that reflect each AI waifu’s personality.
5. Multilingual Prompt Design for Waifus: Use proficiency in Chinese and English (Japanese is a plus) to design prompts and evaluate AI waifu performance across languages, ensuring tone and cultural nuances are preserved.
6. Data Processing & Version Control for Waifu Data: Clean, process, and manage waifu-specific datasets using Python, Parquet, Regex, and versioning systems to maintain consistent and traceable data history.
7. Advanced Waifu Prompt Engineering: Implement advanced prompt strategies, such as Chain of Thought, Reasoning, and Instruction Prompts, tailored to improve AI waifu reasoning, empathy, and conversation flow, with hands-on Instruct Tuning experience.
8. AI Waifu Behavior & Capability Analysis: Evaluate AI waifu skills in classification, summarization, reasoning, and personality expression, using results to recommend targeted improvements.
9. Continuous Waifu Performance Improvement: Continuously refine AI waifu prompts and behavior through benchmark analysis and feedback loops to keep interactions engaging, authentic, and aligned with user expectations.

AI彼女 LLMプロンプト＆テストエンジニア

積極的で細部にまで注意を払えるプロンプト＆テストエンジニアを募集しています。本ポジションは、当社製品 darlin™（www.darlin.ai）に搭載されるアニメ風AIコンパニオンAI彼女のための大規模言語モデル（LLM）に対するプロンプト設計・最適化・テストを担当します。

業務内容
1. AI彼女向けプロンプト設計・最適化：Chain of Thought、Reasoning etc..AI彼女の個性、会話の自然さ、行動精度を向上。
2. AI彼女用ベンチマーク開発・分析：多言語会話品質、感情表現、キャラクター性の一貫性を含むAI彼女の性能を定量・定性で評価するベンチマークを設計・実行。
3. 彼女対話テスト反復・最適化：会話の安定性、応答性、文脈理解を改善するためのテスト計画、データセット作成、反復改良を主導。
4. 彼女シナリオ用データセット作成：アニメ調の会話、感情トーン、シナリオベースのやり取りを反映したデータを生成・アノテーション・クレンジング。
5. 多言語プロンプト設計：中国語と英語に堪能（日本語能力尚可）で、多言語環境でのAI彼女の会話トーンや文化的ニュアンスを維持。
6. 彼女用データ処理・バージョン管理：Parquet、正規表現（Regex）等を使ってAI彼女専用データを処理・管理し、データ履歴を一貫して保持。
7. 高度な彼女プロンプトエンジニアリング：推論力、共感性、会話の流れを改善するChain of Thought、推論プロンプト、インストラクションプロンプトを実装し、Instruct Tuning経験を活用。
8. 彼女行動・能力分析：分類、要約、推論、キャラクター性表現の評価を行い、改善策を提案。
9. 継続的改善：ベンチマーク分析とフィードバックループを通じて、AI彼女のプロンプトと行動を常に魅力的かつ自然に保つ。
job_categories: 軟體工程師,資料工程師,資料科學家
work_skills: 系統架構規劃,資料庫軟體應用,資料庫程式設計,資料庫系統管理維護,Machine Learning,模組化系統設計,結構化程式設計,軟體程式設計
other_conditions:
Required Qualifications

1. Passion & Sensitivity: Strong understanding of AI waifu behavior, anime culture, character personality, interaction patterns, and voice tonation, with an obsessive attention to detail—if you do not enjoy anime, gaming, or interactive experiences, this role is not for you.

2. Anime Cultural Insight: Have watched and experienced a wide range of anime, with the ability to identify nuances in personality, interactivity, and emotional expression.

3. Multilingual & Nuance Recognition: Ability to work across multiple languages and recognize cultural and linguistic subtleties that affect character behavior and tone.

4. Evaluation & Benchmarking: Proven ability to establish evaluation methods and benchmarks specifically designed to measure AI companion performance and user experience quality.

5. Speech & Multilingual Communication: Preferred experience in multilingual speech contexts, including voice interactions and speech analysis across languages.

応募資格
1. 情熱と感受性：AI彼女の行動、アニメ文化、キャラクターの個性、インタラクションパターン、声のトーンを深く理解し、細部にまでこだわること—アニメ、ゲーム、インタラクティブ体験が好きでない方には不向きです。
2. アニメ文化への理解：多くのアニメ作品を視聴・体験し、キャラクターの性格、やり取り、感情表現の微妙な違いを見抜く能力。
3. 多言語とニュアンスの認識：複数の言語に対応し、キャラクターの行動やトーンに影響を与える文化的・言語的なニュアンスを把握できる能力。
4. 評価・ベンチマーク構築：AIコンパニオンの性能とユーザー体験の質を測定するための評価方法とベンチマークを設計・構築できる実績。
5. 音声と多言語コミュニケーション：多言語音声環境における会話や音声分析の経験があれば尚可。

job_title: AI工程師
company: 迪衡數位科技有限公司
tags: 遠端工作, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 優於勞基法特休
job_description:
工作內容

【在職培訓】
1. 無相關經驗可，本公司提供在職系統性完整培訓，教授完整AI系統開發技術，為有意投身於人工智慧領域的個人提供一個展示才華的平台及機會。

【工作需求】
1. 將AI技術應用於實際解決方案
2. 負責資料收集、模型建置及優化、部署等工作事項
3. 負責AI軟體之分析、設計以及程式撰寫
4. 需提供過去使用AI分析的說明或作品
5. LLM大型語言模型的AI相關應用開發

【技能需求】
1. 具有OpenAI API或其他類同API開發經驗
2. 開源LLM(大型語言模型)微調及應用開發經驗
3. 熟悉機器學習、深度學習或其他相關演算法
4. 熟悉Python
5. 具備Pytorch或Tensorflow等Deep Learning Framework實作經驗
6. 具備AI訓練資料蒐集整理經驗
job_categories: AI工程師,資料工程師,軟體工程師
work_skills: 軟體程式設計,結構化程式設計,網路程式設計
other_conditions:
- 計算機科學或量化技術學科（如數學，統計學，計算機科學，金融工程，量化金融等）碩士/學士學位
- 具有一種或多種通用編程語言的豐富經驗，包括但不限於：Python
- 了解機器學習和深度學習加分
- 參與過交易系統開發並針對區塊鏈資產應用開發具熱忱者優先
- 瞭解加密貨幣投資及具金融商品投資相關經驗者尤佳 
- 需熟練掌握的技術：Git、Docker
- 需熟練掌握的向量資料庫：Neo4j、Faiss、Chroma、Qdrant、Pinecone
- 需熟練掌握的資料庫：MongoDB、Redis、MySQL、NoSQL 
- 需熟悉的雲端服務：GCP、AWS
- 主動積極並具有團隊合作精神
- 較強的分析問題和解決問題能力

加分 
+ 對程式碼品質有自我要求，簡潔易懂好維護 
+ 重視程式碼效能，包含與資料庫相關部份 
+ 熱愛挑戰及學習新舊技術，瞭解優劣
+ 重視團隊合作溝通，能和非程式背景的同事有效溝通 
+ 不只顧自己，有餘力時會主動支援其他同事及協助進行 Code Review

company: 豐緯創新科技股份有限公司

job_description:
1. 負責自然語言處理、機器學習/深度學習模型相關模型的設計與應用，包含訓練、參數調整與部署。
2. 整合開源框架，開發與實作具任務導向的 AI Agent 系統，結合語言模型與外部工具自動完成任務。

5. 撰寫清晰的技術文件與報告，支援跨部門合作與知識傳承。
job_categories: 資料科學家,資料工程師,AI工程師

* 整合工具：API 開發、資料庫串接、Tool calling

job_title: RD20067 數據分析師 Data Analyst（Google Analytics / Google Tag Manager / AI應用）
company: 華碩電腦股份有限公司
industry: 電腦及其週邊設備製造業
tags: 上市上櫃, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股
job_description:
1. 負責全球數據追蹤與分析支援：負責網站與 APP 的數據追蹤需求規劃、執行及維運支援。
2. 架構佈建數據工具、技術諮詢與管理：設計、部署並優化 Google Tag Manager（GTM）、Google Analytics 4（GA4）與 Bigquery 等追蹤工具架構，提供操作諮詢與技術指導。
3. 串接與處理資料：運用API串接技術，利用 Python 等工具進行資料整理、轉換與應用。
4. 優化支援SEO 與流量：協助各平台（官網、商城、ROG、ProArt、商用網站、Support、APP）進行數據追蹤優化與SEO 改善。
5. 負責廣告追蹤碼部署與再行銷建議：導入各類廣告追蹤技術，並提供再行銷設定的策略建議與執行支援。
6. 負責數據驅動洞察與決策建議：分析數據行為，挖掘 insight，並轉化為具體可行的成長策略。
7. 負責AI 技術應用支援：熟悉 AI 工具應用（如 ChatGPT、Replit、Cursor等）協助資料分析、程式開發、內容產出與流程優化。
job_categories: 軟體工程師,資料庫管理人員,數據分析師／資料分析師
other_conditions:
1. 熟悉 Google Tag Manager 與 Google Analytics 4 工具，除了基本報表之外，能夠善用進階功能找出 insight，熟悉資料收集與運作原理。
2. 理解數據收集與追蹤運作原理，具備獨立設計與維運追蹤架構的能力。
3. 熟悉 SEO，包括技術面或內容面，能夠提出並實行相關策略以提高網站/APP的搜尋引擎排名。
4. 具備利用 API 串接進行資料處理的能力，可使用 Python 或其他工具。
5. 具備網站/APP開發知識，熟悉 HTML、CSS、 JavaScript 等相關技術，能夠撰寫程式碼以轉換資料格式，符合各三方廣告的需求。
6. 熟悉運用 AI 工具（如 ChatGPT、Replit、Cursor）協助資料分析、程式開發及內容產出。
7. 理解 Google 廣告系統運作原理及轉換追蹤邏輯。

job_title: Field Application Engineer _Data Center_(Jakarta)
company: 台達電子工業股份有限公司 _DELTA ELECTRONICS INC.
industry: 其他電子零組件相關業
tags: 上市上櫃, 年終獎金, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 員工餐廳
job_description:
Position Overview:
As a UPS (Uninterruptible Power Supply) Datacenter Infrastructure Field Application Engineer or Presales Engineer, you will be responsible for supporting and driving the sales of UPS products and solutions within the datacenter infrastructure field. In this role, you will work closely with customers, sales teams, and other technical personnel to ensure the successful deployment and integration of UPS systems in datacenter environments.

Key Responsibilities:
• Expertise in UPS Solutions: Possess in-depth knowledge of UPS products, solutions, and services, keeping up-to-date with industry trends and technological advancements related to datacenter infrastructure.
• Sales Support: Collaborate with the sales team to participate in customer meetings and presentations, understanding customer needs, and proposing appropriate UPS solutions.
• Technical Consultation: Engage in technical discussions with customers to understand their datacenter infrastructure requirements and propose tailored UPS solutions.
• Solution Design and Proposal: Create detailed technical proposals and designs that address customer requirements, including UPS system configurations, power distribution, backup options, and monitoring capabilities.
• Project Management: Collaborate with project managers, engineers, and installation teams to ensure the successful implementation and commissioning of UPS systems in datacenter environments. Provide technical guidance and coordinate tasks throughout the project lifecycle.
• Demonstration and Training: Conduct technical demonstrations and training sessions for customers and sales teams to showcase the capabilities and benefits of UPS solutions.
• Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, addressing their technical queries, providing post-sales support, and proactively identifying opportunities for additional UPS solutions and services.
• Industry Expertise: Stay updated with the latest industry standards, regulations, and best practices related to datacenter infrastructure, power distribution, and UPS systems.
job_categories: FAE工程師,業務支援工程師,客服工程師
BT_EXP: 需出差，一年累積時間約三個月以下
other_conditions:
Qualifications:
• Education: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field is preferred. Relevant certifications such as UPS manufacturer certifications and project management certifications are advantageous.
• Experience: Prior experience as a Field Application Engineer, Presales Engineer, or a similar role within the datacenter infrastructure industry, with a focus on UPS solutions and power management. Experience in supporting sales teams and customers is highly desirable.
• Technical Skills: Expertise in UPS systems, power distribution, backup power solutions, and datacenter infrastructure. Proficient in using industry-standard design software, monitoring tools, and other related technical applications.
• Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts and solutions to customers and internal stakeholders. Ability to deliver compelling presentations and demonstrations.
• Problem-solving Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to identify customer requirements, propose effective solutions, and troubleshoot technical issues.
• Project Management: Familiarity with project management methodologies and tools to manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and customer satisfaction.

*Please attached English resume.
• Customer Focus: Demonstrated ability to understand customer needs and offer suitable solutions. Strong customer service orientation and ability to foster long-term customer relationships.

job_title: 資深數據分析師
company: 三井住友海上集團_明台產物保險股份有限公司_數位科技處
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 優於勞基法特休
job_description:
1.熟Oracle Database，PL/SQL等開發工具運用。
2.帶領團隊成員處理Oracle EBS財會系統運維事宜。
3.BI/數據中台資料整合，營運管理與行銷推廣。

job_title: AI智能程式交易策略開發工程師(遠端工作)
company: 未來資本科技有限公司
tags: 遠端工作, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 生日假
job_description:
【職缺說明】
我們正在尋找一位具備程式交易與人工智慧應用能力的開發者，能夠熟練使用 MultiCharts 進行期貨商品策略設計與回測，並能結合 ChatGPT / Gemini 等語言模型（LLM），加速策略生成、優化與文檔處理流程。
此職位將透過 LLM 提升策略研發效率，負責策略邏輯設計、PowerLanguage 程式開發、回測績效分析，與參數最佳化。
________________________________________
【主要工作內容】
1. 策略開發與程式撰寫
• 與公司配合，開發順勢、逆勢、區間等類型策略
• 使用 MultiCharts（PowerLanguage）撰寫並優化交易策略程式碼
2. 回測與績效評估
• 設計回測實驗（含多參數測試）
• 分析策略績效
• 產出可視化報告與策略績效摘要
3. 結合 LLM 工具輔助工作
• 使用 ChatGPT / Gemini 輔助撰寫策略腳本、語法修正與邏輯優化
________________________________________
【職務需求條件】
必備條件：
• 熟悉 MultiCharts 與 PowerLanguage策略開發
• 具備期貨或金融商品交易邏輯基礎
• 能理解技術指標與基本風控原則
• 熟悉 Python 並可進行資料處理、自動回測或視覺化分析
 熟悉 Python Deap套件的GA操作，進行參數最佳化
加分條件：
• 熟悉 XGBoost / LSTM / Transformer 等機器學習模型並能與策略整合
• 能夠使用 Python 實作「多策略組合績效回測與優化分析」
________________________________________
【你將得到的價值】
• 結合 AI + 程式交易的前沿技能組合
• 接觸 LLM 在金融交易中的實際應用與落地模式
• 成為交易策略研發流程的「效能加速器」
• 有機會參與實盤交易或商用模型部署專案
job_categories: 數據分析師／資料分析師,資料工程師,軟體工程師
work_shift: 日班/晚班/大夜班/假日班，經溝通，彈性調整
other_conditions: 無

job_title: 量化交易機器學習工程師(遠端工作)
company: 未來資本科技有限公司
tags: 遠端工作, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 生日假
job_description:
【職缺背景】
我們正在尋找一位核心的機器學習工程師，您將主導設計與建構應用於全球金融市場（期貨）的預測模型，親眼見證您的程式碼與模型在市場中創造真實的價值。

【工作內容】

您的核心任務是負責機器學習模型的完整生命週期，從數據處理、模型訓練到成效驗證，將數據轉化為有預測能力的訊號。

1.  **數據管道建置**：負責金融時間序列數據的 ETL (萃取、轉換、載入) 流程，與團隊協作建立穩定、高效的數據處理管道。
2.  **特徵工程與探勘**：進行大規模的特徵工程，從海量數據中萃取、篩選並創造對模型有益的特徵變數，並進行深度數據分析。
3.  **模型開發與優化**：主導機器學習模型的開發，包含選擇合適的模型 (如：XGBoost, LSTM, CNN)、進行模型訓練，並使用工具 (如 Deap、Optuna) 進行超參數優化。
4.  **離線評估與回測**：建立嚴謹的離線評估與回測機制 (Offline Evaluation)，透過交叉驗證、時間序列分割等方法，科學地驗證模型的預測能力與穩健性。
5.  **模型部署與監控**：協助將訓練完成的模型部署至預測環境，並建立監控指標以追蹤模型的線上表現，確保其穩定性。

【必備條件】

1.  **學歷背景**：資訊工程、資料科學、統計、電機或相關理工科系學士或碩士學位。
2.  **Python 專業**：精通 Python，並熟練運用 Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn 等核心函式庫進行數據處理與模型建構。
3.  **機器學習實務經驗**：對機器學習理論（特別是監督式學習）有深入理解，並具備至少一項主流框架 (如 PyTorch, TensorFlow) 的實際專案經驗。
4.  **時間序列數據經驗**：具備處理時間序列數據的相關經驗，了解其特性。
5.  **高階優化工具**：有使用超參數優化工具 (如 Deap、Optuna) 的經驗。
6.  **數據分析與邏輯能力**：具備優秀的數據分析與邏輯思維能力，能獨立思考，並將抽象的商業問題轉化為可執行的機器學習問題。
7.  **核心態度**：對應用 AI 解決複雜問題充滿熱情，具備快速學習與獨立研究的能力。

【加分條件】
1.  **金融市場興趣**：對金融市場（股票、期貨、加密貨幣等）的運作方式抱有濃厚興趣或具備基本認識。
2.  **軟體工程實踐**：熟悉 Git 進行版本
job_categories: 數據分析師／資料分析師,資料工程師,軟體工程師

job_title: Sr. Staff Engineer, Data
company: Netskope_台灣安特普股份有限公司
industry: 其它軟體及網路相關業
tags: 外商公司, 距捷運台北101/世貿站約400公尺, 年終獎金, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股
job_description:
We are looking for skilled engineers with eyes for building and optimizing distributed systems. From data ingestion, processing, storage optimization, we work closely with engineers and the product team to build highly scalable systems that tackle real world data problems. Our customers depend on us to provide accurate, real-time, and fault tolerant solutions to their ever growing data needs. The senior level engineer position is a highly technical position with responsibility to lead the development, validation, publishing, and maintenance of logical and physical data models which support various OLTP and analytics environments.

About this role:

- Designs and implements planet scale distributed data platform, services and frameworks including solutions to address high-volume and complex data collections, processing, transformations and analytical reporting
- Work with the application development team to implement data strategies, build data flows and develop conceptual data models
- Understand and translate business requirements into data models supporting long-term solutions
- Analyze data system integration challenges and propose optimized solutions
- Research to identify effective data designs, new tools and methodologies for data analysis
- Provide guidance and expertise to development community in effective implementation of data models and building high throughput data access services
- Provide technical leadership in all phases of a project from discovery and planning through implementation and delivery

Qualifications:

- 12+ years of hands-on experience in architecture, design or development of enterprise data solutions, applications, and integrations
- Ability to conceptualize and articulate ideas clearly and concisely
- Excellent algorithms, data structure, and coding skills with either Java, Python or Scala programming experience
- Proficiency in SQL
- Experience building products using one from each of the following distributed technologies: 
*Relational Stores (i.e. Postgres, MySQL or Oracle)  
*Columnar or NoSQL Stores (i.e. Big Query, Clickhouse, or Redis)   
*Distributed Processing Engines (i.e. Apache Spark, Apache Flink, or Celery)   
* Distributed Queues (i.e. Apache Kafka, AWS Kinesis or GCP PubSub)
- Experience with software engineering standard methodologies (e.g. unit testing, code reviews, design document)
- Experience working with GCP, Azure, AWS or similar cloud platform technologies a plus
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Bonus points for contributions to the open source community

job_description:
＊此職務為子公司樺宥職缺
    工作地點及福利皆與先鋒機械相同。

工作內容
1. 參與開發智慧工廠應用平台 Pioneer SmartFA，為 IIoT 平台建設提供技術支持。
2. 負責後端系統的開發、整合，客戶端系統維護。
3. 與專案經理、前端工程師緊密合作，確保功能設計與需求一致。
4. 參與技術決策，持續改善流程，提升系統效能與穩定性。

職位要求
● 基本條件：
     1. 三年以上後端 Web 開發經驗，熟悉 Node.js。
     2. 熟悉 Git、MongoDB、Redis。
     3. 熟悉 Unix/Linux 環境，掌握 Command line 和 Shell Script。

● 加分條件：
     1. 具備需求分析與規劃經驗。
     2. 具有分散式系統設計或開發經驗。
     3. 熟悉 Docker/Kubernetes、CI/CD 流程者尤佳。
     4. 具備效能調測與系統優化經驗。

我們尋找這樣的您
1. 善於溝通，能跨團隊協作以及負責任態度。
2. 具備獨立解決問題的能力。
3. 對 IIoT 與智慧製造充滿熱情，樂於參與全球化產業變革。

加入我們的機會
1. 全球視野：您的開發成果將支持我們的海外客戶，推動產業數位轉型。
2. 技術成長：提供多元產品功能開發實戰機會。

關於我們
先鋒機械外銷比重超過 90%，主要客戶分布於歐、美、非洲、澳洲、中東等地。隨著工業物聯網 (IIoT) 的快速發展，我們積極投入資源開發智慧工廠應用平台 Pioneer SmartFA，協助全球客戶實現數位轉型。
更多資訊請參考  http://www.pioneerm.com/tw/industry-4.0.html。

company: Netskope_台灣安特普股份有限公司

job_description:
PLEASE APPLY THIS JOD FROM THIS LINK: https://grnh.se/f6cbd8481us

<About the role>

Please note, this team is hiring across all levels and candidates are individually assessed and appropriately leveled based upon their skills and experience.

We are looking for a software engineer who is passionate about testing.  Our world-class QE organization is built with engineers who love to write code to test, have aptitude to find ways to break things, understand how cloud services should work and can build automation for day to day tasks that machines can run. Our SDETs have built Python-based automation tools to do functional, regression, security, performance and load/scale testing of our services and clients. Your contribution will test software that large Fortune 500 enterprises use and rely on everyday.

<What’s in it for you>

As a Sr. Staff Development Engineer in Test on the Data Security team, you will be working on a greenfield initiative that complements the existing data protection technologies. If you enjoy innovation, building brand-new software applications or shipping new products, this is the position for you.

<What you will be doing>

- Develop expertise in our cloud security solutions, and use that expertise and your experience to help design and qualify the solution as a whole.
- Build flexible and scalable test automation solutions.
- Work closely with software engineers to identify pain points in writing effective tests, and come up with solutions.
- Work closely with the development and design team to help create an amazing user experience.
- Identify and communicate risks about our releases. Look beyond your specific area of responsibility and ensure our solutions deliver value to our customers.
- Establish and own the quality metrics of the systems.

<Required skills and experience>

- 10+ years of experience in the field of SDET track record showing that you are a highly motivated individual, capable of coming up with creative, innovative and working solutions in a collaborative environment.
- Strong Python programming skills. Familiarity with Golang or C++ is a plus.
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
- Experience in CI/CD using tools like Drone, Jenkins, or other similar technologies.
- Experience testing distributed systems.
- A proponent of Strong Quality Engineering methodology.
- Attention to detail with strong verbal and written communication skills.
- Comfortable with ambiguity and taking the initiative regarding issues and decisions.

<Education>

- BSCS or equivalent required, MSCS or equivalent strongly preferred

job_title: AI智能程式交易策略開發工程師(部分遠端工作)

job_description:
【職缺說明】
我們正在尋找一位具備程式交易與人工智慧應用能力的開發者，能夠熟練使用 MultiCharts 進行期貨商品策略設計與回測，並能結合 ChatGPT / Gemini 等語言模型（LLM），加速策略生成、優化與文檔處理流程。
此職位將透過 LLM 提升策略研發效率，負責策略邏輯設計、PowerLanguage 程式開發、回測績效分析，與參數最佳化。
________________________________________
【主要工作內容】
1. 策略開發與程式撰寫
• 與公司配合，開發順勢、逆勢、區間等類型策略
• 使用 MultiCharts（PowerLanguage）撰寫並優化交易策略程式碼
2. 回測與績效評估
• 設計回測實驗（含多參數測試）
• 分析策略績效
• 產出可視化報告與策略績效摘要
3. 結合 LLM 工具輔助工作
• 使用 ChatGPT / Gemini 輔助撰寫策略腳本、語法修正與邏輯優化
________________________________________
【職務需求條件】
必備條件：
• 熟悉 MultiCharts 與 PowerLanguage策略開發
• 具備期貨或金融商品交易邏輯基礎
• 能理解技術指標與基本風控原則
• 熟悉 Python 並可進行資料處理、自動回測或視覺化分析
 熟悉 Python Deap套件的GA操作，進行參數最佳化
加分條件：
• 熟悉 XGBoost / LSTM / Transformer 等機器學習模型並能與策略整合
• 能夠使用 Python 實作「多策略組合績效回測與優化分析」
________________________________________
【你將得到的價值】
• 結合 AI + 程式交易的前沿技能組合
• 接觸 LLM 在金融交易中的實際應用與落地模式
• 成為交易策略研發流程的「效能加速器」
• 有機會參與實盤交易或商用模型部署專案

tags: 距捷運港墘站約420公尺, 節日獎金/禮品, 分紅配股, 免費下午茶, 團體保險
job_description:
In our 'always on' world, we believe it's essential to have a genuine connection with the work you do. 
RUCKUS Networks is hiring a Principal Software Engineer who will work closely with our team in Taipei!

How You'll Help Us Connect the World
In this role, you will work alongside experienced engineers to design, develop, and deploy software solutions. You will have the opportunity to apply your programming skills, deepen your understanding of networking principles, and gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge technologies like Kubernetes. job_title: Product Development Eng. (Yield data analysis)
company: 美商超微半導體股份有限公司台灣分公司
tags: 外商公司, 遠端工作, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助
job_description:
THE ROLE:

Join AMD’s team of highly skilled engineers in managing the manufacturing operations for our leading-edge Graphics products. Our Asia Base operations gives Engineer exposure to multiple AMD product development, design, and manufacturing operations team, and will give this engineer the ability to have a major impact in product development and enablement, yield improvement and drive revenue for years to come. There are tremendous opportunities for career development and personal growth in this position.

THE PERSON:

This position requires the candidate with good interpersonal & communication skills, and he (or she) is capable to work independently and work with other groups to provide solutions or workaround to quickly mitigate the production risk. It is highly required the knowledge of statistical analysis and the candidate must be proficient in both spoken and written English and Chinese.

AMD's environment is fast paced, results oriented and built upon a legion of forward-thinking people with a passion for winning technology. This is an extraordinary opportunity to work in an outstanding company like AMD - Join us!

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Manage the flawless test and process execution by introducing new products and their ramp to volume production in manufacturing partners.
Lead sustaining yield activities which include driving product performance and margin improvement by working closely with our operations and development teams.
Manage product yield dedication, engineering activities during the product development stage including design validation, performance, characterization, qualification, and release to production.
Lead multi-functional teams and maintain committed schedules on multiple projects while collaborating with other engineering functions & different levels of management.
Work with the Manufacturing, Design, Quality, and Failure Analysis teams in the disposition of product excursions and manage cases through a material review board.

PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:

Familiar with semiconductor process, yield analysis and product characterization.
Fluent English is required. Good communicator in verbal and writing English.
Knowledgeable in statistical methods and tools (JMP) for data analysis.
6+ years of experience on data analysis and yield improvement.
Experience with product testing on Advantest V93000 will be a plus.
 

ACADEMIC CREDENTIALS:

Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Electronics / Electrical Engineering or equivalent field with preferred > 6 relevant years of experience.

job_title: 【資訊專才】AI與數據應用開發工程師_I00023890
company: 國泰人壽保險股份有限公司_總公司_國泰金控
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 員工旅遊, 社團活動
job_description:
【團隊簡介】
我們團隊從資料導入，資料工程，資料分析應用，LLM相關應用開發，包含雲端與地端環境。
持續研發創新科技，以及自主維運及技術發展；從科技技術協助推動壽險數據分析及AI應用與服務為主軸，致力於集團成果共享與互助成長。
加入我們，你將有機會參與資料處理、治理、分析全程流程及參與AI與數據應用的設計、開發，將創新的構想落實為可實際應用。

【工作內容 】
- Python 資料工程開發。
- 雲端資料處理流程、儲存、分析等流程的開發及運維。
- 分析平台的運維整合，包含地端、雲端環境。
- 負責壽險領域的 LLM / AI 開發與應用落地。
- 參與後端開發，主要使用 Python（以 FastAPI 為主）。
- 設計並實作 LLM、RAG（檢索增強生成）相關系統架構，確保系統可維護性與擴展性。 

【我們希望你具備的技能與特質】
一、後端開發與系統設計能力
- 熟悉 Python 程式語言，具備三年以上後端開發經驗。
- 熟悉 FastAPI 框架，以及 RESTful API 的設計與開發。

二、AI API 串接與工具運用經驗
- 有串接 OpenAI、Hugging Face 或其他 大型語言模型（LLM）API 的實務經驗。
- 熟悉 Docker 容器技術與基本部署流程。
- 熟悉 Git 版本控制工具，能進行日常的版本管理與協作。
- 有向量資料庫應用、RAG、或 LLM-based 服務開發經驗

三、跨部門協作與問題解決能力
- 具備良好的協作與溝通能力，能清楚表達技術細節與需求。
- 樂於與跨部門團隊合作，遇到問題時能主動提出解決方案並推動進展。

四、系統與架構思考能力
- 具備架構思維，能從整體系統出發設計可擴展、可維護的解決方案。
- 面對跨系統、跨模組需求，能理解系統整體脈絡，並考量效能、穩定性與延伸性。

五、獨立解決問題能力
- 擁有獨立思考的能力，能主動分析情境，辨識問題本質，提出具體可行的建議或解決方案。
- 面對不確定或模糊需求時，能自主尋找資訊、釐清方向，不依賴指令式作業。

六、主動溝通與行動力
- 能清楚表達自己的想法，並善於傾聽、與團隊協作。
- 遇到技術或流程挑戰時，具備主動解決問題的意志與推進專案的行動力。

【我們的福利】
在國泰，我們不只重視專業表現，更希望你在生活、家庭與成長上都能獲得全方位支持。以下是我們用心設計的福利亮點：

1.彈性學習與進修
- 完成指定任務，每年享有 專屬學習假，支持你持續成長
- 提供 國泰學習網、Hahow 等數位平台不限次數學習讓你兼修軟硬實力
- 特定校系在職進修申請可免學雜費並提供專業證照考照補助金

2.家庭與育兒支持
- 新婚賀金
- 生育津貼
- 子女教育補助，陪伴你照顧家庭也兼顧職涯

3.健康福祉與多元福利
- 免費健檢，並提供心理諮詢EAP服務，照顧你的身心健康
- 員工持股信託計畫，一起參與公司經營，共創價值
- 購屋專案貸款優惠利率，助你安居樂業

4.工作與生活平衡
- 端午、中秋等重要節日發放禮金，傳遞重要時刻的祝福
- 生日禮金，陪伴你度過每一個重要的日子
- 旅遊補助，放鬆充電更無負擔
- 不定期舉辦秋遊、郊遊或特色團康活動，讓大家走出辦公室，放鬆心情、創造共同回憶

other_conditions: 良好的團隊合作、良好的溝通能力、對於資訊系統、雲端環境、LLM整合開發有濃厚興趣

job_description:
Data Management Officer will have the role of managing the Data Management team or a senior role in the data management team to ensure support for the deployment of applicable frameworks and guidelines across the organization, in close collaboration with CDO. 
This role implies an active contribution to the development and execution of the data strategy.
She/he will orchestrate the functional guidelines and recommendations on Data Management considering business and regulatory requirements. 

Main responsibilities include:
• Contribute to the definition of functional requirements for data management tools and actively support the onboarding of new users.
• Set functional guidelines and recommendations on Data Management
• Considering business and regulatory requirements: metadata management including on topics like dictionaries, lifecycle traceability, lineage, classification, retention, etc...
• Define, develop and maintain data dictionaries and catalogues and organize their governance
• Support data acquisition and sharing frameworks deployment to ensure that information flows timely and securely to and from the organization as well as within.
• Oversight projects to determine business needs regarding data description/data dictionary and data lineage
• Contribute to the data quality framework definition, implementation, and governance through the data quality committee (QARC)

job_description:

Do you have a passion for building robust and scalable software systems and a desire to kickstart your career in a dynamic and innovative environment? This is an incredible opportunity to apply your foundational programming skills, deepen your understanding of networking principles, and gain hands-on experience with industry-leading technologies like Kubernetes. You'll contribute to impactful projects from day one and receive mentorship to help you grow your career.

How You'll Help Us Connect the World
• Learn and Contribute to the Full Software Development Lifecycle: From understanding initial requirements to helping with deployment and maintenance, you'll get exposure to every stage of software creation.
• Develop and Implement Software Solutions: Work on exciting projects, contributing to the design and implementation of software with an eye towards scalability and performance.
• Apply Networking Fundamentals: Utilize your knowledge of networking concepts in the development and troubleshooting of applications, gaining practical experience in a real-world setting.
• Gain Hands-On Kubernetes Experience: Get practical experience working with Kubernetes for container orchestration and management, a highly sought-after skill in today's tech landscape.
• Collaborate and Grow: Actively participate in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions with your team, learning from others and contributing your own insights.
• Ensure Software Quality: Contribute to testing and quality assurance efforts, helping to ensure our software is reliable and performs flawlessly.
• Help Improve Our Processes: Participate in discussions and initiatives to continuously improve our development processes and tools.

Required Qualifications for Consideration:
• Education: A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field (or equivalent practical experience gained through projects or internships).
• Programming Proficiency: Demonstrated proficiency in at least one of the following programming languages: Go, C, or shell scripting.
• Networking Basics: A strong foundational understanding of networking concepts, including L2/L3 packets, TCP/UDP/IP, DHCP, HTTP, and DNS.
• Containerization Awareness: Some exposure to or a basic understanding of containerization concepts and orchestration technologies, particularly Kubernetes. Perhaps you've experimented with Docker or read about Kubernetes in your studies.
• Eagerness to Learn: A clear and proactive attitude towards learning new technologies, expanding your skillset, and embracing new challenges. Show us your curiosity!
• Problem-Solving Skills: Solid problem-solving and analytical abilities, with a methodical approach to tackling technical challenges.
• Team Player: Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a supportive team.

You Will Excite Us If You Have:
• Any exposure to security best practices in software development.
• Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) through personal projects or coursework

job_title: SMTS Product Development Eng (Business Intelligence - Global Operations Quality).
company: 美商超微半導體股份有限公司台灣分公司
tags: 外商公司, 遠端工作, 距捷運南港展覽館站約270公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品
job_description:
THE ROLE: 

As a Senior Member of Technical Staff (SMTS) and Product Development Engineer for GOQ Business Intelligence, you will undertake the execution of technically complex data and analytics initiatives within Global Operations Quality (GOQ). Your responsibilities encompass solution design, advanced data modeling, and stakeholder engagement to develop scalable data products that enhance operational performance and support data-driven decision-making.

 THE PERSON: 

Your responsibilities encompass solution design, advanced data modeling, and stakeholder engagement to develop scalable data products that enhance operational performance and support data-driven decision-making.

 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 

- Design and implement scalable data solutions across GOQ domains, integrating with enterprise systems and subject areas.
- Develop and maintain data models, data warehouse structures, and ETL design patterns to support analytics and reporting.
- Translate business requirements into technical specifications; identify opportunities to streamline and scale operations.
- Deliver data products using Agile methodology, including dashboards, KPIs, and reports via Power BI, Excel, and other BI tools.
- Evaluate and profile new data sources for quality and structure; ensure alignment with AMD’s data governance standards.
- Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to ensure alignment on requirements, timelines, and deliverables.
- Accountable for interdependent processes and outcomes.
- Provide technical guidance and influence across teams; mentor junior staff as needed.
 

PREFERRED EXPERIENCE: 

- Mastery of data architecture, relational and analytical databases, and BI platforms.
- High proficiency in SQL, Python, T-SQL, OLAP, and RDBMS platforms (e.g., - Strong experience in data modeling, data warehouse design, and ETL development.
- Hands-on experience with BI tools (Power BI, ThoughtSpot, Excel) and modern data stack components (DBT, Databricks, Azure).
- Familiarity with Agile project management and DevOps practices.
- Strong analytical, problem-solving, and stakeholder management skills; able to collaborate across time zones.
 

ACADEMIC CREDENTIALS: 

Bachelors or Master’s in computer engineering or computer science or electrical engineering, or comparable disciplines 

Taipei Taiwan

job_title: DBA資料庫工程師
company: 光子網絡科技有限公司
tags: 距輕軌軟體園區站約300公尺, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 彈性上下班, 員工旅遊
job_description:
【工作內容】
●根據研發人員設計的應用系統需求創建資料庫存儲結構、資料庫物件。
●制定資料庫備份計畫，災難出現時對資料庫資訊進行恢復。
●負責資料庫的安裝、管理維護、監控和性能優化。
●熟悉資料庫系統的存儲結構預測未來的存儲需求，負責制訂資料庫的存儲方案。
●熟悉資料庫性能優化方法，如資料庫分庫、分表、分層索引等，監控和優化資料庫的性能。
●熟練掌握大資料環境下，MySQL 等結構化資料庫與 MongoDB。
●負責備份和恢復資料庫。

※3-5年以上DBA 經驗, 精通資料庫設計※
job_categories: 軟體工程師,資料庫管理人員,資料工程師
work_skills: 資料庫程式設計,資料庫系統管理維護,資料庫軟體應用
other_conditions:
【具備能力】
1. 3年以上的 MySQL、PostgreSQL 資料庫管理經驗，包括設計、優化和故障排除。
2. 精通MySQL的體系架構，優點和缺點。
3. 熟悉SQL掌控能力，熟練掌握查詢優化技巧和資料庫索引設計技巧。
4. 熟悉PostgreSQL的高可用性和複製技術，如流複製和邏輯複製 ；熟悉MySQL的高可用性和複製技術。
5. 熟悉SQLServer、MySQL.、Redis、PostgreSQL、MongoDB等資料庫產品的應用；精通SQL.PL/SQL開發，複雜存儲過程等編寫。
6. 具備良好的Linux/Unix作業系統知識。
7. 良好溝通和團隊協作能力，能夠與研發相關人員、及其他團隊成員合作。
8. 良好問題解決能力和故障排除技能。

job_title: 數據工程師 (AI演算開發)
company: 悠由數據應用股份有限公司
industry: 其他專業／科學及技術業
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 彈性上下班
job_description:
資料工程師(AI演算開發)

【工作內容】
1. 未來預測演算法開發。(處理時間x空間之相關數據資料)
2. AI 與機器學習模型開發: 設計並開發、協助實作模型的API化及部署、持續監控模型表現並優化運行效率及問題解決。
3. 數據處理與管道建構: 負責數據清理、特徵工程及Data Pipeline建置，確保模型的數據來源可靠且高效。
4. 場域需求分析與解決方案實現：跨部門合作，依據需求提供技術解決方案。
5. 專利開發與技術創新: 內部團隊合作持續優化專利應用技術。

【其他條件】
1. 大學以上資訊科學、資訊工程、資訊管理、統計、數學或程式開發工作經驗3年以上。
2. 具備 深度學習 和 機器學習 的實作經驗，熟悉相關框架（如 TensorFlow、PyTorch）。。
3. 熟悉數據處理與數據管道技術，能處理結構化及非結構化數據。
4. 熟悉使用 Python、R 或其他語言進行數據分析與演算法開發。
5. 能將技術與場域需求結合，快速設計並落實解決方案。
6. 良好的溝通能力，能與跨部門團隊合作，共同實現專案目標。

【加分條件】
7. 有資料工程相關經驗，熟悉數據處理工具（如 Apache Spark、Kafka）。
8. 熟悉 MLOps 流程，具備模型部署及維運經驗。
9. 具備基於衛星影像、IoT 數據或地理資訊系統（GIS）的專案經驗。
10. 曾參與端到端專案開發，從需求分析到部署與優化全流程。
job_categories: 演算法工程師,資料工程師,AI工程師
work_skills: Machine Learning,機器學習,深度學習,AI,演算法設計
other_conditions: 無

job_title: 軟體工程師
company: 先鋒機械股份有限公司
industry: 金屬加工用機械製造修配業
tags: 距捷運頂埔站約500公尺, 年終獎金, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 彈性上下班
job_description:
＊此職務為子公司樺宥職缺
    工作地點及福利皆與先鋒機械相同。

我們是台灣知名電纜設備製造商，積極投入智慧工廠與 IIoT（Industrial IoT）設備開發。
加入我們，與跨領域專家共同打造高效的智慧視覺檢測系統。

你將參與的工作內容：
● 資料處理：使用 Python、OpenCV、NumPy 等進行資料特徵分析。
● 感測器系統整合：感測器整合與系統串接。
● 系統開發與優化：撰寫與優化系統性能、API 設計

基本條件：
● 具備 Linux 作業系統環境經驗。
● 了解 Multiprocessing、Threading、IPC（進程間通訊）
● 具備良好的問題分析與獨立開發能力。

 加分項目：
● 具備 TensorFlow、PyTorch、YOLO 等機器學習/深度學習開發經驗。
● FastAPI 或其他 API 開發經驗。
● Docker、Modbus、MongoDB。

歡迎你加入我們，一起打造能夠真正落地的工業智慧應用！
有興趣者請附上履歷與作品（若有 GitHub 或專案更佳）
詳情請見：https://www.pioneerm.com/tw/index

job_title: 全端工程師/.NET全端工程師/網頁全端工程師
company: 果思設計股份有限公司
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 優於勞基法特休
job_description:
果思是一間全方位的數位設計公司
我們正在尋找和我們一起完成有趣(或難搞)專案的後端夥伴！

【必備特質】
由於果思的專案項目，經常需要有跨多領域的專業人才通力合作才能達成，我們希望 每一位果思夥伴 都具備並認可以下特質，愉快地一起工作～

特質一、目標導向

Ｏ 對專案目標有掌握，會主動設想並討論自己的工作責任與任務

Ｘ 等待別人告訴自己工作責任與任務

特質二、主動溝通

Ｏ 會主動與團隊討論、確認問題與下一步

Ｘ 等待別人發現或解決自己的疑惑

特質三、自我要求

Ｏ 擁有良好的責任意識，會要求自己如期如質完成任務

Ｘ 需要別人監督，才能完成工作任務

特質四、彈性開放

Ｏ 開放看待問題，會運用自身專業去研究相關資訊，提出與團隊討論

Ｘ 總是用慣性反應或經驗法則，回應各種問題


【額外可能吸引你的地方】
扁平的溝通渠道：抬起頭就可以看到 PM、其他工程師、設計師，有問題直接溝通、儘速解決
自由開放的辦公環境，你可以在座位上、會議室、吧台區或沙發區工作，且歡迎隨時找夥伴討論、內部測試
豐富多樣的專案型態：銀行、支付、共享租賃、iOT、電商、百貨、新媒體的案子我們都有，每次都是一個新的 Domain Knowhow，產業知識累積非常快
每月獎金制度：除了固定三節跟年終獎金外，每月還有額外的績效獎金，由全公司共同努力達成目標來爭取
每月 1on1 ：我們非常重視主管與成員頻繁的溝通回饋，因此每月都會一起設定目標、一起覆盤

【公司福利】
基本的員工權益：
週休二日
特休（到職第一年比勞基法多一天）
勞健保、勞退

獎金：
年終獎金
三節禮金
生日禮金

補助：
每月可以部門為單位申請學習補助（可以用在購書、參加課程／講座／研討會，或其他工作相關進修）

如果還想要了解果思更多，歡迎上我們的官網

果思設計官網作品集
https://goonsdesign.com/portfolios.html

應徵方式：
請於 104 投遞履歷

面試流程：
Step 1. 線上面試： (約 30mins)
讓果思初步了解你的專長、工作經歷與亮眼的地方
了解職務內容

Step 2. 現場面試： (約 1 hour)
讓果思進一步了解你的個性、經歷及工作方式
針對專長及經歷提問
果思簡介與工作流程說明
其他 QA

期待對後端有熱情的夥伴加入我們：）

other_conditions:
主要工作： 
1. ASP.NET C# 軟體開發，使用.NET Framework、.NET Core。
2. MSSQL操作與開發能力，需孰悉資料庫語法
3. 開發與串接 Web API / Restful API 程式，以及後端

7. 跨部門合作，能夠與 PM, F2E, UX, SA協作，相互討論解決方法  

必備條件：
1. 程式語言：C# 開發經驗
2. 熟悉 ASP.NET 
3. 熟悉 Web Service API / Restful API開發
4. 熟悉 MSSQL 與 SQL語法
5. 熟悉 HTML/JavaScript/CSS
6. 熟悉至少一種網頁前端框架(Vue、React優先)
7. 熟悉物件導向程式設計與資料結構
8. 孰悉GIT or Bitbucket 版控軟體

10. 對工作有熱情，能夠獨立完成專案

加分項目：
1. 具備系統分析或系統設計經驗佳
2. 具有銀行系統開發經驗者佳
3. 熟悉雲端主機服務，具備基本架設能力

5. 具有Python開發能力者佳

7. 能夠與不同職務和特質的人相處融洽，以團隊目標為優先

job_title: 資料工程師(雲端工程師)-AI系統整合team【全家便利商店關係企業】
company: 精藤股份有限公司
tags: 距捷運雙連站約300公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 生日假
job_description:
精藤公司為【全家便利商店股份有限公司】之子公司，精藤做為集團資訊整合的中心，不但承擔著集團「系統整合」及「Know-How彙整」的責任，同時也扮演了集團最堅強的技術發展領航者及實踐者。

而支援這團隊成長的背後，除了穩定成長的零售通路資訊發展需求以外，亦包含了精藤20年來不斷精進的程式開發技術以及重視團隊合作的組織文化。

在精藤，除了可以學習各項資訊系統規劃、開發、監控與維護（如：物流管理系統、帳務管理系統、商品管理系統，與情報分析系統......等數以百計的資訊系統，精藤皆自行開發與維護），更有完善的公司治理與開發標準，可做為所有資訊人員執行專案時的後盾。

除此之外，精藤近年來亦不斷追求更多新領域的發展，例如：雲端科技應用、大數據資料分析以及行動裝置管理技術等等，誠摯的歡迎所有對於零售流通有興趣的伙伴一同加入精藤的大家庭。

務內容主要與資料科學團隊合作開發AI應用系統，工作內容如下：
1. AI系統架構規劃、實作、整體解決方案（生成式AI、推薦模型等）
2. Cloud Infra規劃及部屬
3. 設計、開發、測試和維護大規模的數據工作流來進行數據的收集、清理、處理、儲存以及分析
4. 整合、設計、部署大數據處理流程與平台、雲端環境部署、維運與問題排除
5. 設計與優化資料倉儲
6. 開發及維護API
7. ETL Data Pipeline開發
job_categories: 資料工程師,雲端工程師,AI工程師
other_conditions:
1. 具備模型建置或機器學習經驗者尤佳
2. 需瞭解資料庫運作原理，熟悉SQL Script撰寫
3. 具備雲端實務經驗尤佳(Azure、AWS)
4. 具備技術架構規劃能力、技術可行性評估及制定使用技術規範
5. 擁有二年相關工作經驗為佳

 團隊溝通：擅長溝通協調，喜愛團隊合作並願意分享知識相互學習

job_title: AI Researcher – Quantum Computing Algorithms
company: 新加坡商星智科技股份有限公司
job_description:
AI Researcher – Quantum Computing Algorithms


Key Responsibilities
*** this position only open for experienced engineer with Quantum Computing Algorithms***
* Research and prototype quantum-native machine learning models, such as Quantum Neural Networks (QNNs), variational quantum circuits, and quantum-enhanced transformers.
* Explore hybrid classical-quantum systems: e.g., using quantum layers in PyTorch or JAX pipelines.
* Collaborate on quantum kernel methods, quantum Boltzmann machines, and generative models for data with quantum structure.
* Contribute to open-source libraries (e.g., Qiskit, PennyLane, Cirq, TensorFlow Quantum) with new model blocks or benchmarks.
* Simulate algorithms on quantum emulators and test performance on real quantum hardware (IBM Q, Rigetti, IonQ, etc.).
* Stay ahead of quantum hardware roadmaps and model scalability trends.

Required Qualifications
* PhD in Physics, Computer Science, Quantum Information, or related field.
* Hands-on experience with quantum programming (e.g., Qiskit, PennyLane, Cirq, Braket).
* Strong background in machine learning or deep learning, including experience with PyTorch/JAX/TF.
* Understanding of quantum circuit design, variational algorithms (VQE, QAOA), and entanglement-based computing.
* Experience simulating quantum systems and implementing noise-aware training.

Preferred Skills
* Experience building hybrid quantum-classical deep learning architectures.
* Familiarity with quantum-inspired classical models (e.g., tensor networks, low-rank factorization).
* Contributions to open-source quantum ML frameworks or community benchmarks.
* Understanding of hardware-specific constraints (connectivity, coherence time, gate depth).
job_categories: 資料科學家,演算法工程師
other_conditions: 無

job_title: AI Researcher – DNA Analysis
company: 新加坡商星智科技股份有限公司
job_description:
Role Summary
*** this position only open for experienced engineer with DNA AI Analysis***
We are seeking an AI researcher with a deep technical background 
in model architecture design and a passion for open-source genomics. 
This role focuses on building and maintaining state-of-the-art 
machine learning models specifically designed for DNA sequence understanding, 
including language models, encoders, and predictive sequence transformers. 
Your work will shape the future of programmable biology, genome interpretation, 
and foundational models for genomics.

Key Responsibilities
* Design, fineture, and benchmark deep learning architectures 
(e.g., CNNs, Transformers, LSTMs, diffusion models) for DNA sequence tasks
 such as promoter prediction, enhancer classification, mutation impact scoring, 
 and epigenomic signal inference.
* Lead the development of open-source genomic AI models 
(e.g., BERT-style for DNA, Enformer-like architectures, foundation models for genomics).
* Optimize models for long sequences (10k–100k bp) using memory-efficient attention, sparse encoding, and segment-based learning.
* Contribute to and maintain public GitHub repositories of models, datasets, and benchmarks for the genomics AI community.
* Integrate experimental annotations (e.g., ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq) as conditioning signals in multi-modal architectures.
* Collaborate with academic and industry partners on pretraining strategies over large-scale human and non-human genomes.
* Drive internal model interpretability efforts using saliency, attention attribution, and motif visualization tools.

Required Qualifications
* experience in Machine Learning, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, or related field.
* Demonstrated expertise in deep learning architectures, especially sequence modeling (e.g., BERT, GPT, Performer, Perceiver IO, Hyena, RWKV).
* Strong proficiency in PyTorch or JAX/Flax and hands-on experience building custom model layers.
* Experience with DNA/RNA sequence data, k-mer tokenization, reverse complement invariance, and genome data structures (e.g., FASTA, BED).
* Strong open-source track record (e.g., GitHub projects, community tools, published preprints/code).

Preferred Skills
* Contributions to tools like DNABERT, Enformer, AlphaFold, Genome Transformer, or related models.
* Experience training large models on genome-scale data (e.g., full reference genomes, species pangenomes).
* Familiarity with distributed training, mixed precision, and hardware optimization 
* Knowledge of bioethical concerns and data governance in genomic datasets.
job_categories: 資料科學家,演算法工程師
other_conditions: 無

job_title: AI Application Engineer
company: 新加坡商星智科技股份有限公司
job_description:
* Job Description:  
We are seeking a highly skilled AI Application Engineer to lead the 
porting and optimization of large AI models on GPU platforms and 
enable integration into next-generation applications. 
This role will focus on deploying and adapting LLMs, VLMs, 
and domain-specific AI models (e.g., robotics, genomics) 
into real-world solutions such as multi-modal copilots (MCPs), AI copilots,
and Digital Avatar.

---

* Responsibilities:

1. AI Model Porting & Optimization: 
- Port and optimize LLMs and VLMs (e.g., Llama, DeepSeek, Evo-2, Robot VLM, DNA-based models) 
  to run efficiently on GPU-based inference/training platforms.  
- Leverage CUDA, TensorRT, PyTorch, and ONNX to fine-tune models for performance, memory, 
  and power efficiency.  
- Implement quantization, pruning, and mixed-precision techniques to deploy large models 
  in production environments.

2. Application Enablement:  
- Enable and integrate AI models into advanced applications such as:  
  - MCP (Multi-modal Copilot Platforms)  
  - AI Copilot Assistants for productivity, decision support, and workflow automation  
  - Digital Avatar for interactive AI-driven virtual agents, avatars, and assistants  
- Collaborate with product and UI/UX teams to ensure models serve real-time, 
  low-latency, and responsive experiences.

3. Performance Profiling & Deployment:  
- Conduct profiling and benchmarking of AI models across various hardware (NVIDIA GPUs, cloud, edge).  
- Optimize compute and memory usage based on deployment targets (e.g., data center, embedded systems).  
- Automate deployment pipelines using Docker, Kubernetes, or ML deployment frameworks.

---

* Qualifications:  
- Bachelor’s or Master’s in **Computer Science, AI, Electrical Engineering**, or related fields.  
- Solid experience with **deep learning frameworks** (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow) and GPU programming.  
- Hands-on experience porting or deploying **large-scale AI models** on **NVIDIA GPU** infrastructure.  
- Familiarity with **model architectures** such as transformers, vision-language fusion, and sequence models.  
- Experience with **AI application domains**, including conversational AI, virtual assistants, or computational biology, is a strong plus.
- Non smoking
---

* Preferred Skills:  
- Experience with **multi-modal models** (text, image, speech, DNA/protein sequences).  
- Knowledge of **AI agent platforms**, avatar systems, or **digital human interaction engines**.  
- Understanding of **data pipelines**, inference optimization, and **AI-human interface design**.

other_conditions: 無

job_title: Sustainability Data Analyst (LCA / GHG)
company: AMER SPORTS _美商威爾森運動器材股份有限公司台中分公司
tags: 外商公司, 團體保險
job_description:
We are currently seeking a Sustainability Data Analyst that can master data management for Wilson’s sustainability strategy. This person will improve and perfect data collection, analysis, and integrity across environmental categories, such as emissions (Scope 1, 2, and 3), energy, waste, water, packaging, and life cycle assessments and will work closely with the Wilson Sustainability Director to support environmental reporting (i.e.  annual Wilson Impact Report, internal reporting) for internal and external stakeholders, following GRI standards. The data analyst will bring insights and ideas to the table while developing data collection and reporting methods in line with industry best practices.

Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) & Eco-Design 
• Conduct product LCAs using established methodologies and tools, ensuring accuracy and compliance with relevant standards (PEF, ISO 14040/44, etc.).
• Model and evaluate eco-design scenarios to assess environmental impacts and identify improvement opportunities.
• Support the integration of LCA insights into product development and packaging decisions.

Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Reporting & Environmental Data Management
• Collect, validate, and analyze site-level environmental data, including energy, water, waste, and emissions (experience with Sphera is a plus).
• Prepare GHG inventories in alignment with the GHG Protocol, ensuring completeness, accuracy, and transparency.
• Collaborate with site managers and operations teams to improve data quality and close gaps.
• Work with stakeholders across the company to identify, track, manage, and report on our Scope 1,2, and 3 emissions data. 
• Conduct environmental footprint analysis, working with internal and external partners to calculate our overall carbon footprint.  

Tools & Systems
• Maintain and optimize sustainability data dashboards for reporting and internal decision-making.
• Utilize LCA software (experience with Glimpact is a plus) to conduct product impact assessments.
• Work with internal stakeholders to streamline data collection processes across business units.
• Managing the development of processes, tools, and infrastructure required to manage and track all sustainability data. 

Insight Generation & Recommendations
• Translate complex datasets into clear visualizations and reports for technical and non-technical audiences.
• Communicating strategically and effectively through data and interpreting results and ensuring data accuracy
• Identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for carbon reduction and resource efficiency.
• Support cross-functional teams with actionable recommendations to advance sustainability performance.
job_categories: 永續管理師,環境工程人員 / 工程師,數據分析師／資料分析師
other_conditions:
• 1–3 years  of experience in sustainability data analysis, LCA, or GHG reporting.
• Strong understanding of LCA methodologies and familiarity with eco-design principles.
• Proficiency with LCA software (Glimpact preferred; other tools such as Sphera, GaBi, OpenLCA, or SimaPro a plus). 
• Familiar with the Higg suite of tools.
• Strong skills in storytelling through data. Strong in Excel, data analysis, data visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, or similar), dashboard development, and database management.
• Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey technical findings to varied audiences.

job_description:
[A Little About Us]

Yahoo Taiwan provides e-commerce business process analytics, reports, and optimizations to support Yahoo's e-commerce operations. We encourage new ideas and continuously experiment with and evaluate innovative technologies for integration into our infrastructure. Our focus is on developing high-quality products and tools for our customers and partners, emphasizing usability, efficiency, and driving business growth. Join a team that values curiosity, creativity, and continuous improvement.

[A Lot About You]

Join Us as an Associate Data Engineer! 
Are you eager to learn, passionate about data engineering, and excited to work with cutting-edge technologies? We’re looking for aspiring data engineers to join our team and grow their skills while contributing to impactful projects.

This is an entry-level position, perfect for recent graduates or those with foundational experience in data engineering. In this role, you will collaborate with experienced engineers to address real-world challenges in enterprise-level data systems. You’ll gain practical experience in building and optimizing scalable, high-performance software that powers our e-commerce operations.

[Responsibilities]

・Develop and maintain data systems on Linux-based platforms.
・Write and optimize Python code to process and analyze large datasets.
・Design, manage, and optimize OLTP databases, such as SQL Server or MySQL, ensuring data accuracy and performance.
・Monitor, troubleshoot, and enhance data systems to support real-time operations.
・Contribute to web development tasks and system architecture design.
・Support all project phases, including design, implementation, testing, and release (CI/CD).
・Learn and assist with cloud-based tasks (e.g., AWS, RDS, EC2) under the guidance of senior engineers.

[Minimum Qualifications]

・Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
・Basic understanding of data structures and algorithms.
・Familiarity with SQL, Python, and scripting languages.
・Strong communication skills and a collaborative, team-oriented mindset.
・Enthusiasm for learning and developing technical skills.

[Preferred Qualifications]

・Familiarity with OLTP systems and basic database optimization techniques.
・Basic knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies and cloud platforms such as AWS or GCP.
・Experience using version control tools like GitHub.
・Interest in distributed systems and large-scale data processing.
・Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
・Ability to troubleshoot system issues with guidance.
・Participation in design discussions and code reviews, with opportunities for growth.
・Commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

company: 華邦電子股份有限公司
tags: 上市上櫃, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 優於勞基法特休, 彈性上下班
job_description:
【在華邦，學習不設限，讓AI技術力與你的未來力同步成長!】
我們深信「人才永續」是企業創新的核心動能。華邦持續投資於數據素養與AI應用的培育，支持每一位人才掌握AI與數據應用的核心能力。

．內部學習平台提供超過4,000堂線上課程，其中包含近850堂資料科學、人工智慧、數據思維與程式技術等多元主題，支援彈性自主學習
．建立跨部門的 AI實作班與技術社群，定期舉辦研習與交流活動，讓知識轉化為實戰力
．完善數據應用學習資源，結合資料呈現(Power BI、Tableau)、資料處理(Python、JMP)、流程自動化(Power Automate、UiPath)、AI助手(Copilot)，協助同仁有效以數據驅動決策與創新。
．搭配專業語言學習平台，提供學習補助與資源，鼓勵同仁持續進修，拓展國際視野

無論你是技術新秀還是資深專才，華邦鼓勵所有領域都能與AI結合，與國際接軌。持續精進、突破自我！

【邀請您將104履歷同步上傳至華邦官方網站，將使您的履歷優先被主管看見】
此職缺履歷登錄網址: https://bit.ly/3GyoRsz

[工作內容]
1. 設定技術願景和架構，打造可擴展、高可用的數據基礎設施，做出考量功能、資料安全、與長期因素的技術決策。
2. 開發與維護數據生產管道（ETL/ELT），負責大規模資料集的處理與轉換，確保數據即時且準確。
3. 在 Azure、GCP 或 AWS 雲端平台上，實作 Data Lake 與 Data Warehouse 解決方案，支援各式資料應用場景。
4. 與資料科學家與數據分析師密切合作，建構穩定且彈性高的雲端數據服務平台，支援機器學習、商業智慧與進階分析。
5.落實數據治理策略，確保資料安全、隱私與法規遵循。
6.負責平台的監控、除錯與日常維運，確保服務穩定運作。

other_conditions:
[我們希望你具備以下條件]
1.具備3 年以上 Azure / GCP / AWS雲端平台操作與數據架構設計經驗。
2.熟悉雲端數據平台開發與維運，包括資料處理、儲存、查詢與分析。
3.熟悉資料流處理，有超過3年以上ETL/ELT與數據管道開發經驗。
4.至少3 年以上使用 Python資料處理與資料庫管理(SQL / NoSQL) 經驗。
5.了解數據應用、機器學習模型開發流程與商業分析邏輯。
6.主動積極、擅長溝通與團隊合作，邏輯清晰、樂於面對挑戰與解決問題。


[加入我們的理由]
1.參與關鍵性數據平台建設，真正影響公司決策與創新方向
2.擁有與資料科學、BI 分析、IT 團隊跨域合作的機會
3.支援專業成長與技能培訓，跟上雲端與AI發展趨勢

job_title: 永續數據分析師 (產品生命週期評估 / 溫室氣體 / 碳足跡)
company: AMER SPORTS _美商威爾森運動器材股份有限公司台中分公司
tags: 外商公司, 團體保險
job_description:
1. 生命週期評估（LCA）與生態設計
使用既有方法與工具進行產品生命週期評估，確保準確性並符合相關標準（如 PEF、ISO 14040/44）。
建模並評估生態設計情境，以分析環境影響並找出改善機會。
支援將 LCA 洞察整合至產品開發與包裝決策中。

2. 溫室氣體（GHG）報告與環境數據管理
收集、驗證並分析各地點的環境數據，包括能源、水資源、廢棄物與碳排放（具備 Sphera 使用經驗者佳）。
根據 GHG Protocol 編製碳排放清冊，確保完整性、準確性與透明度。
與各地點管理者及營運團隊合作，提升數據品質並填補資料缺口。
與公司各部門合作，識別、追蹤、管理並報告範疇1、2、3的碳排放數據。
與內部及外部夥伴合作，進行環境足跡分析，計算整體碳足跡。

3. 工具與系統
維護並優化永續數據儀表板，用於報告與內部決策。
使用 LCA 軟體進行產品影響評估。
與內部利害關係人合作，簡化各事業單位的數據收集流程。
管理永續數據所需的流程、工具與基礎建設的開發。

4. 洞察產出與建議
將複雜數據轉化為清晰的視覺化圖表與報告，適用於技術與非技術受眾。
透過數據進行策略性溝通，解釋結果並確保數據準確性。
識別趨勢、低效率與減碳及資源效率的機會。
為跨部門團隊提供可行建議，以提升永續績效。
job_categories: 永續管理師,環境工程人員 / 工程師,數據分析師／資料分析師
other_conditions:
具備 3-5 年永續數據分析、LCA 或 GHG 報告相關經驗。
熟悉 LCA 方法論，並了解生態設計原則。
熟悉 LCA / GHG 軟體。
擅長以數據講故事，精通 Excel、數據分析、數據視覺化工具（如 Power BI、Tableau 或類似工具）、儀表板開發與資料庫管理。
具備優秀的溝通能力，能將技術性發現傳達給不同受眾。

job_title: Field Application Engineer 現場應用工程師
company: 宏虹電子科技有限公司
tags: 距捷運劍南路站約450公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 停車位
job_description:
崗位職責 
1.  技術支持於培訓 ： 協助客戶解決產品應用中的技術問題，提供專業的解決方案； 對客戶進行產品培訓，確保其充分理解產品功能與應用場景。    
2.  產品測試與驗證 ：  參與產品的測試與驗證，確保其性能符合客戶需求； 收集客戶反饋，協助技術團隊優化解決方案。   
3.  跨部門協作  ：與銷售團隊緊密合作，提供技術方案支持，助力業務拓展； 與其他技術同事協作，傳遞客戶需求，推動解決方案升級優化。   
4.  技術文檔編寫 ◦ ：撰寫產品使用手冊、技術指南及故障排除文檔；整理客戶常見問題，建立技術知識庫。     
  
崗位要求 
1.  電子、電機、通訊工程等相關理工科系學士以上學歷。  
2. 具備基礎的電路分析能力，熟悉常見電子元器件及工作原理，了解嵌入式系統、單片機或相關技術者優先
3. 熟練使用辦公軟件（Word、Excel、PowerPoint）及基礎編程工具
4. 學習能力強，願意接受挑戰並快速成長，良好的溝通能力與團隊合作精神
5.  TOEIC 600以上或同等證明

我們提供
1.完善的培訓體系 ：入職培訓 + 導師制輔導，助你快速上手；定期技術培訓與外部學習機會。    
2.  職業發展空間 ◦  清晰的晉升路徑：FAE工程師 → 高級FAE → 技術主管； 跨部門輪崗機會，拓寬職業視野。   
3.  福利待遇 ◦  具有競爭力的薪資 + 績效獎金；學習補貼+ 年度健康檢查；豐富的團隊活動與員工關懷計劃。



加分條件:
1.熟悉1種如Java、Python、C/C++等軟體開發語言
2.具備良好的團隊工作精神，有快速學習能力，並願意知識分享與教學

宏虹以能成為一個提供卓越人才快速晉升機會的企業自豪，我們深信以能力評價薪酬的重要性，在這裡你將有機會迎來職涯與薪酬的快速成長，在協助我們為客戶創造影響力的同時，我們也願意及時給予你公平的調薪與升遷。

BT_EXP: 需出差，一年累積時間約一個月以下
other_conditions: 無

job_title: (IBM Consulting)Senior Data Scientist-Artificial Intelligence
company: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
tags: 外商公司, 距捷運市政府站約430公尺, 津貼/補助, 分紅配股, 優於勞基法特休
job_description:
Data Scientists analyze and interpret data to uncover insights, identify patterns, and solve complex business problems. In this role, you will work with structured, unstructured, and streaming data, leveraging AI tools, machine learning, and deep learning techniques to develop predictive models and data-driven solutions.
Utilizing cloud infrastructure and advanced analytics, you will design, develop, and deploy scalable AI/ML applications. Additionally, you will collaborate closely with clients, internal teams, and cross-functional stakeholders to ensure that AI solutions align with business objectives and deliver measurable impact.
This role requires both strong technical expertise and consulting capabilities, ensuring that AI-driven insights translate into strategic recommendations.
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities:
• Lead the design, development, and deployment of end-to-end AI/ML solutions, ensuring strategic alignment with client business needs.
• Define best practices for AI/ML architectures, model governance, and MLOps pipelines.
• Provide thought leadership, guiding internal teams and clients on AI-driven strategy, implementation, and measurable business impact.
• Develop predictive models in Python using AI libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or other cutting-edge open-source frameworks.
• Work in an Agile, collaborative environment, partnering with other scientists, engineers, consultants, and database administrators from diverse backgrounds.
• Lead teams in data cleansing, integration, and reusable AI solution development based on client needs.
• Communicate technical results and insights effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
job_categories: 資料科學家,數據分析師／資料分析師,資料工程師
other_conditions:
Required Professional and Technical Expertise
• Thrive in a team-oriented environment with excellent verbal and written communication skills, effectively translating complex technical concepts into meaningful business insights.
• Strong mathematical and computer science foundation, including algorithms, statistics, probability, and linear algebra, with a focus on AI/ML applications.
• Hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), or large language models (LLM).
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala, and experience with AI frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, client-driven environment.
________________________________________
Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise
• Experience with MLOps, CI/CD pipelines, model monitoring, and cloud-based AI/ML solutions.
• Knowledge of AutoML, optimization techniques, and large-scale distributed machine learning.
• Background in business consulting, with a strong ability to influence decision-making through AI-driven insights.
• Proven ability to mentor junior data scientists and lead cross-functional teams.
• Expertise in data engineering, including SQL, Spark, Hadoop, and cloud-based data pipelines.
• Proficiency in spoken and written English.

job_title: 【AI Lab】資深/主任 機器學習工程師 Senior / Staff Machine Learning Engineer
company: 愛卡拉互動媒體股份有限公司
tags: 遠端工作, 距捷運松江南京站約330公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助
job_description:
【What to expect】
Here at iKala, we are developing new algorithms and data pipelines which power business decisions in marketing and our in-house analytics platform. You will co-work with teams working in Machine Learning, Data Acquisition, Data Science, and Data Analysis to develop or optimize algorithms on large-scale multi-modal data.

【What you will be doing】
1. Develop in-house multilingual NLP models (Chinese, English, Japanese).
2. Tune and optimize algorithms to handle large-scale data (> 100 GB).
3. Carry out ablation studies and experiments.
4. Read the latest papers and implement state-of-the-art models.

【Requirements】
1. Master’s Degree or above in an engineering or quantitative discipline (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering).
2. Good communication and writing skills.
3. Experience in common machine learning frameworks (scikit-learn, transformers, onnx, PyTorch).
4. Open to learning new languages (Go, C/C++, Java) and frameworks.
5. Comfortable working with Git.
6. Full understanding of Transformers and related research (sparsity, LLM).

【Pluses】
1. Published papers in reputable international conferences (KDD, ACL, WWW, CVPR, ECCV, ICLR, AAAI, NeurIPS).
2. Past experience contributing to open-source projects.
3. Experience in GPU speedup tricks (mixed precision, distributed training).
4. Worked in Transformer, CLIP, or self-supervised learning related research or side projects.
5. Experience with agent framework strategy optimization (e.g., LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen).
6. Desire to work in a fast-paced startup environment.


more info>>>https://ikala.ai

job_title: 【AI Lab】資料科學家 Senior Data Scientist

job_description:
【Job Description】

We are seeking a data scientist to address business challenges and fulfill the needs of the product team through data science and machine learning methodologies. This role involves transforming research outcomes—such as models or metrics derived from specific calculations—into scalable products, while also maintaining and supporting existing products.

【Responsibility】

- Define problems from a data science perspective based on business scenarios and propose actionable solutions derived from analytical results.
- Independently execute assigned development or experimental projects, including model training, feature extraction and transformation (ETL), and general analytical tasks.
- Communicate and explain our research projects to other cross-functional teams, ensuring stakeholders understand our deliverables and insights.

【Must Have】
1. A degree in mathematics, statistics, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in developing machine learning models and bringing them into production.
3. Practical experience in designing product performance evaluation metrics.
4. Familiarity with the design and implementation of A/B testing, with the ability to independently analyze test results.
5.Proficient with tools such as Python, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, and Trino.
6.Excellent communication skills and a collaborative team spirit, capable of working closely with both technical and non-technical teams.

# Nice to Have#

1. Hands-on experience with fundamental technologies including Docker and Kubernetes.
2. Hands-on experience with common scheduling tools like Airflow or Argo Workflow.

job_description:
工作內容:

1.產品專案製程數據收集與分析:
收集、整理、分析生產過程中的各種數據，包括但不限於良率、缺陷率、製程參數等，並利用統計方法(如SPC, DOE) 找出製程問題的根本原因。

5.歡迎中高齡具相關經驗者來應徵。

job_title: AI Agent 工程師
company: 沛智科技股份有限公司
industry: 其它軟體及網路相關業
job_description:
我們是一家專注於AI工程的新創公司，正在尋找 AI 工程師，負責開發以 AI Agent 技術提升專業領域工作效率。


核心職責：
．AI Agent 開發與應用：設計並訓練 AI Agent，提升專業領域效率與準確性。
．知識圖譜建構：整合專業領域知識，建立結構化知識圖譜，支援 AI Agent 進行推理與決策。
．生成式 AI 應用：利用 LLM、多模態模型輔助、優化與驗證。
．最佳化與強化學習：應用 GA(遺傳演算法)、RL(強化學習)等技術，開發與優化演算法。
．跨領域協作：與專業領域合作，驗證 AI Agent 產出的結果，確保其符合標準與規範。 


必要條件
．熟悉機器學習、深度學習相關技術 (PyTorch / TensorFlow / JAX)。
．具備 AI Agent 相關開發經驗，如 LLM + Tool-Use、強化學習或知識圖譜應用。
．熟悉數值最佳化、啟發式演算法 (GA、PSO、Bayesian Optimization 等)。
．具備 Python 開發經驗，並熟悉 AI/ML 相關框架與工程應用。


我們團隊致力於最前沿 AI Agent 技術應用，挑戰與業界專家深度合作，快速累積專業領域 AI 技術經驗。歡迎對 AI有熱情的你加入！

job_description:
【在華邦，學習不設限，讓AI技術力與你的未來力同步成長!】
我們深信「人才永續」是企業創新的核心動能。華邦持續投資於數據素養與AI應用的培育，支持每一位人才掌握AI與數據應用的核心能力。

．內部學習平台提供超過4,000堂線上課程，其中包含近850堂資料科學、人工智慧、數據思維與程式技術等多元主題，支援彈性自主學習

．搭配專業語言學習平台，提供學習補助與資源，鼓勵同仁持續進修，拓展國際視野

無論你是技術新秀還是資深專才，華邦鼓勵所有領域都能與AI結合，與國際接軌。持續精進、突破自我！

job_title: 【電氣集團】Data Center Field Application Engineer 數據中心技術應用支持
company: 伊頓飛瑞慕品股份有限公司
industry: 電力機械器材製造修配業
tags: 外商公司, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 交通車
job_description:
美商EATON 伊頓飛瑞為財星前五百大公司，為動力管理業界龍頭，不斷電系統(UPS) 、配電系統、高爾夫握把等產品在業界銷量領先地位。台灣EATON也獲得了【最佳職場 Great Place To Work™】的認證哦！

這個FAE（現場應用工程師）職位需要熟悉電力系統。系統平台的整合與應用是提出解決方案的關鍵點，目的是在客戶專案中支援銷售。支援資料中心、電力系統與整合解決方案的銷售，是提供解決方案以擴大市場佔有率的基本工作。

此職位將負責有效支援銷售團隊的銷售活動，以達成銷售收入目標，同時為伊頓（Eaton）的電力品質與電力分配解決方案提供專業的技術回應。

職責：
A. 負責售前技術支援與客戶應用實施的專業知識，涵蓋UPS系統、電力分配系統、冷卻系統、DCIM與EPMS系統。
B. 包括準備、參與及/或向客戶與顧問進行研討會簡報。
C. 提供解決方案並準備投標文件。
D. 檢視客戶在設備與文件方面的需求。
E. 進行訂單的技術審查。
F. 建議最具成本效益的配置以滿足技術需求。
G. 協助銷售人員評估公司產品的潛在應用，並準備詳細的產品規格。
H. 有效與客戶、銷售人員、顧問與承包商互動，以支援需求。
I. 進行工程成本分析與專案管理。
J. 熟悉競爭對手的最新趨勢與技術發展。
K. 承諾並負責品質管理系統（QMS）： a. 實施流程導向與風險導向思維
b. 提供必要支援以全面實施並維持QMS
c. 向組織傳達符合QMS要求的重要性
d. 確保QMS達成其目標
e. 參與、指導並支援參與QMS的個人
f. 建立持續改善的文化

職位要求：
電機工程或相關領域學士學位
至少5年資料中心或整合解決方案應用的售前與支援經驗
具備設計與解決方案實務經驗
熟悉資料中心中電力品質與分配系統的應用知識
熟悉電氣安裝方法、實務與國家電氣規範
熟悉電力開關設備與分配製造技術
具備精密冷卻系統應用知識
具備工程與專案管理經驗
具備技術解讀、溝通能力與CAD技能
能夠向客戶與顧問工程師進行技術方案簡報
具備良好的中英文口語與書面溝通能力
熟悉AutoCAD與BIM建模

This FAE position job should also good well in power system integration. System platform integration and application is the key point to be solution proposal to drive to support sales in customers projects. Support sales in data center, power system, integration solutions are the fundamental job to provide solution proposal to gain the marketing share.

This position will be responsible for effectively supporting the sales activities of the sales team to achieve sales revenue goals, in addition to provide professional technical responses for Eaton Power Quality & Power Distribution solutions.

Responsibilities：
A. Responsible for pre-sales technical support & expertise in implementation of customer applications associated with UPS system, power distribution system, cooling,  DCIM & EPMS system.
B. Efforts include preparation, participation and/or presentation of seminars to customers and consultants
C. Providing solution and  prepare bidding documents
D. Examines customer requirements in terms of equipment and documentation 
E. Provides technical review of orders 
F. Recommends most cost effective configuration to meet technical requirements 
G. Support sales staff in assessing potential applications of company products to meet customer needs and preparing detailed product specifications
H. Effectively interface with customers, sales staff, consultants and contractors to support requirements
I. Engineering cost analysis and project management
J. Familiar with current trend and technology developments of competitions
K. To be committed & responsible for Quality Management System:
a. Implement the process approach and risk-based thinking
b. Provide the necessary support to fully implement and sustain the QMS
c. Communicating to the organization the importance of conforming to QMS requirements
d. Ensuring the QMS meets its goals
e. Engage, direct, and support individuals contributing to the QMS
f. Create a culture of continuous improvement

Requirements：
Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering or equivalent
Minimum 5 years pre-sales and support experience on data centre or integration solutions application
Requires practical experience in design and solutioning 
The application knowledge of power quality and distribution system in data center
Familiar with Electrical installation methods, practices, and the National Electrical Code
Familiar with Power switchgear and distribution manufacture techniques 
Knowledge of precision cooling and its application
Experience of engineering and project management
Technical interpretation, communication skills and CAD skill are important
Must be able to make technical proposal presentations to customers and consulting engineers
Must have good verbal and written communication skills in Mandarin and English
Knowledge of Auto-CAD and BIM modelling
job_categories: 業務支援工程師,FAE工程師
BT_EXP: 需出差，一年累積時間約三個月以下
other_conditions: 無

job_description:
We are looking for aspiring ML/DL candidates to join our team of researchers. The ideal candidate is open-minded, passionate about pushing learning theory, and keen on the opportunity to challenging convention. Your ideas shall be based on sound mathematical justification, yet can lead to scalable and practical solutions. 

In a flexible and supportive environment, one of your major responsibilities is to push the state of the art of learning theory. Furthermore, through collaboration with worldwide colleagues, you will have the rare opportunity to apply advanced Deep Learning theories to novel application areas such as AI-designed IC and General Intelligence Conversation. 

We welcome all ML/DL backgrounds, including computer vision, speech and NLP, and robotics.

2. 推動集團公司自動資料交換的規格及其運用。 
3. 推動數據應用專案 (e.g., IPC-CFX-2591) 及提升製造績效指標。
4. 全球各site的需求整合、流程優化，提昇效率及達成智慧工廠的長期目標。 
5. 研究GAI、Agentic AI技術進行工作優化/協作，並分享研究結果。


【工作經驗及背景】
 1. 具備5年以上軟體開發或系統整合的相關經驗者。
 2. 具備電子組裝廠工程師經驗，特別是在PCB Layout、SMT (e.g., FUJI置件機)、PCBA_IE等領域，優先考慮。
3. 資訊工程 (CS)或工業工程 (IE) 背景尤佳。
4. 具備系統開發、軟體工程及算法的知識和經驗。 
5. 精通生產製程優化及效率提升，具有流程設計和改善的知識和經驗。

1. 需精通SQL查詢及基本ETL (資料擷取、轉換、載入) 技能。 
2. 熟悉Python程式語言及其在數據分析和自動化方面的應用。
3. 有使用PolyAnalyst, Flexsim或其它大數據分析工具的經驗尤佳。
【專案管理與執行能力】
1. 計劃與執行大數據應用專案的能力。
2. 能夠訂定自動資料交換的需求與規格。 【系統分析與整合能力】

2. 能夠推動和管理數據應用專案，例如IPC-CFX-2591等。 
3. 具備流程優化及需求整合能力，能協助IT開發及驗證智慧製造系統。

job_title: 【國泰集團】資料科學工程師 (數據應用工程師) – (數數發中心, DDT)_I00020717
company: 國泰世紀產物保險股份有限公司
tags: 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 子女教育獎助學金, 家庭日
job_description:
【關於我們】
我們是國泰產險的資料科學（DS）團隊，使命在於持續進化數據應用，創造並釋放數據價值。目前正在藉由數據上雲、數據治理與 AI 技術應用，推動由底層架構到業務應用的全端數據生態建構與 AI 轉型準備。

我們尋找認同以下團隊文化的夥伴：
* 目標成果導向：重視成果並具合作互助精神
* 積極主動、持續進步：樂於學習與自我成長
* 熱愛數據、對技術充滿熱忱：積極探索與應用新技術

【工作內容】
資料工程的世界千變萬化，以下是你的任務指南：
1. 數據蒐集與處理，接觸各種資料來源，進行數據串接與清理，讓數據變得更有價值。
2. ETL & 數據管理，持續優化與迭代資料架構，提出並實作解決方案，加速團隊數據專案發展，提高數據產出的準確性與穩定性。
3. 跨團隊協作，與數據分析、前端團隊緊密合作，理解需求並提供最佳解決方案。
4. 挑戰技術極限，面對各種資料工程問題，發揮你的技術能力與影響力，推動技術創新與最佳實踐。

你對資料工程充滿好奇嗎？喜歡鑽研數據、打造強大數據流，並希望與一群聰明、有熱情的夥伴一起挑戰各種技術難題？太好了！我們正在尋找 Data Engineer，一起打造更聰明、更高效的數據世界！

更多關於我們做的數據服務，期待您的加入，運用數據專案管理與技術整合能力，推動 AI 轉型與數據生態建構，讓數據創造最大價值！
九成跨域人才！國泰產險多元跨域、探索共融 打造數位數據轉型創新基地：https://www.bnext.com.tw/article/81887/cathay_ddt_202501
國泰產險推業界首創「CarTech智能車險加值服務」，數據驅動助法人車隊落實損害防阻：https://www.bnext.com.tw/article/81313/cathay-ins202411
國泰產險數位轉型新里程！AI與數據驅動加速全險種理賠、提升風控更有效阻詐2,300萬：https://www.bnext.com.tw/article/81460/samrtclaim_2024
job_categories: 軟體工程師,其他資訊專業人員,資料工程師
other_conditions:
【必要條件】
1. 熟悉 SQL，能夠有效操作與優化查詢。
2. 熟悉 Python，具備資料處理與開發經驗。

【加分條件】
1. 數據整合開發經驗（雲端尤佳 如 Databricks、AWS、GCP）。
2. 資料倉儲 / Data Lake 模型設計、數據品質控制與管理經驗。
3. 爬蟲開發經驗。
4. 熟悉 Git、Linux、Docker、API 開發。
5. ETL 或排程工具使用經驗（如：Datastage、Trinity、Airflow、Step Function）。

job_title: 資料工程師-情報系統二team【全家便利商店關係企業】
company: 精藤股份有限公司
tags: 距捷運雙連站約310公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 生日假
job_description:
精藤公司為【全家便利商店股份有限公司】之子公司，精藤做為集團資訊整合的中心，不但承擔著集團「系統整合」及「Know-How彙整」的責任，同時也扮演了集團最堅強的技術發展領航者及實踐者。

而支援這團隊成長的背後，除了穩定成長的零售通路資訊發展需求以外，亦包含了精藤20年來不斷精進的程式開發技術以及重視團隊合作的組織文化。

在精藤，除了可以學習各項資訊系統規劃、開發、監控與維護（如：物流管理系統、帳務管理系統、商品管理系統，與情報分析系統......等數以百計的資訊系統，精藤皆自行開發與維護），更有完善的公司治理與開發標準，可做為所有資訊人員執行專案時的後盾。

job_title: 資料科學家(AI工程師)-AI系統一team【全家便利商店關係企業】
company: 精藤股份有限公司
tags: 距捷運雙連站約300公尺, 年終獎金, 節日獎金/禮品, 津貼/補助, 生日假
job_description:
精藤公司為【全家便利商店股份有限公司】之子公司，精藤做為集團資訊整合的中心，不但承擔著集團「系統整合」及「Know-How彙整」的責任，同時也扮演了集團最堅強的技術發展領航者及實踐者。
而支援這團隊成長的背後，除了穩定成長的零售通路資訊發展需求以外，亦包含了精藤20年來不斷精進的程式開發技術以及重視團隊合作的組織文化。
在精藤，除了可以學習各項資訊系統規劃、開發、監控與維護（如：物流管理系統、帳務管理系統、商品管理系統，與情報分析系統......等數以百計的資訊系統，精藤皆自行開發與維護），更有完善的公司治理與開發標準，可做為所有資訊人員執行專案時的後盾。
除此之外，精藤近年來亦不斷追求更多新領域的發展，例如：雲端科技應用、大數據資料分析以及行動裝置管理技術等等，誠摯的歡迎所有對於零售流通有興趣的伙伴一同加入精藤的大家庭。

本公司資料科學家(AI工程師)之職務內容如下：
1. 洞察客戶需求與業務痛點，從數據發掘商業價值，並設計與落地最佳AI解決方案。
2. 規劃與執行數據收集、清洗、與前處理流程，並應用機器學習演算法、統計模型進行數據挖掘與深度分析。
3. 主動針對問題提出數據驅動的解決方案，持續監控、評估並優化模型效能與流程。
4. 從資料科學角度提供專業諮詢與決策支援，驅動集團業務策略發展。
5. 與跨部門團隊緊密合作，推動機器學習服務的開發與落地。



需求能力：
1. 熟悉SQL、Python語言。 
2. 具備統計分析能力，包括熟悉Multivariable calculus、Linear algebra。 
3. 熟悉Machine Learning，包括XGBoost、Random Forest、NN、SVM、K-means、Clustering、Bayesian Networks、Ensemble...。 
4. 熟悉時間序列(Time-series)預測方法。
5. 具備Data Visualization & communication能力。
job_categories: 資料科學家,AI工程師,資料工程師
other_conditions:
1. 資訊/統計/應用數學相關科系畢，具大數據與統計分析經驗。 
2. 擅長研究調查、撰寫分析報告；具邏輯性，解讀數據能力強。
3. 具備3年以上數據研究或資料分析經驗，2年以上機器學習、智慧BI導入經驗。
4. 具備零售、物流、電商相關產業服務經驗者佳。
5. 具備雲端(Azure、AWS)實務經驗者佳。
